ğŸ§ª Device Initialization
Initialize one or multiple lab instruments before workflow begins
deviceId (string): "cytation5" - Internal name or alias of the device
deviceType (enum): "photoreactor" | "cytation" | "robot" - Optional for UI grouping
initMode (enum): "soft" | "hard" - Soft: warmup only; Hard: full reset/init
timeoutS (int): 30 - Max wait time before failing
retryCount (int): 2 - Retry attempts before failure
âœ… User Confirmation Prompt
Ask user to confirm a physical setup step before proceeding
promptText (string): "Confirm vial placement" - Message shown to the user
expectedResponse (enum): "yes" | "ok" | "done" - Optional; expected answer
timeoutS (int): 120 - Time to wait for response
abortOnTimeout (bool): true - Whether to cancel if no response
ğŸ” Liquid Transfer
Transfer a specified volume from a source to a target container
sourceContainer (string): "stock_A" - Container ID or label
targetContainer (string): "reactor_tube" - Destination container ID
volumeMl (float): 0.5 - Volume to transfer in mL
speedUlPerS (float): 300 - Transfer speed
pipetteType (enum): "single" | "multi" - For robotic arms with multiple tips
mixAfter (bool): true - Optional mix step post transfer
ğŸ”† Start Reaction
Activate a device to start a chemical or biological reaction
deviceId (string): "photoreactor_1" - Device ID or name
mode (string): "UV-A 365nm" - Reaction mode or preset
durationS (int): 300 - Duration in seconds
intensityPct (int): 80 - Optional power level %
ğŸ“ Trigger Measurement
Trigger a device to measure sample or system status
deviceId (string): "cytation5" - Name or alias of the measurement device
measurementType (enum): "OD600" | "fluorescence" | "absorbance" - Common readout types
wavelengthNm (int): 600 - Optional override
integrationTimeMs (int): 500 - Optional timing config
exportFormat (enum): "csv" | "json" - Output file format
saveTo (string): "results/exp001_cytation.csv" - File path or DB destination
â¸ï¸ Pause / Delay Step
Pause the workflow execution for a fixed duration
durationS (int): 300 - Duration to pause in seconds
reason (string): "Allow reaction to settle" - Shown in UI/log
skippable (bool): true - Whether user can skip this manually
